# Welcome

[Welcome](https://stephgemmell.netlify.app/posts/welcome/) to my portfolio site! This website was originally created for SMPA 3230, Data Journalism, at George Washington University.

Some of my data journalism projects are posted under the category [SMPA](https://stephgemmell.netlify.app/#category:smpa).

# About

I'm a writer, researcher, and composer, and I'm about to graduate from George Washington University in May!

To learn more about me, check out the [About](https://stephgemmell.netlify.app/about.html) page.
